程序包 game.terrains

类 Cemetery

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
game.terrains.Cemetery
所有已实现的接口:
DesignOSoulsAddOn, Capable, Printable
public class Cemetery
extends Ground
Cemetery -- is a kind of Ground If you want to change its initial place Just need to change the map ArrayList on Application class

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    static char CEMETERY_CHAR
    char 'c' represents Cemetery
    private int successRate
    As required: Each cemetery has a 25% success rate to spawn/create Undead (Hollow soldier)(@see Enemies) at every turn

    从类继承的字段 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground

    displayChar

    Constructor without any parameter It is for FancyGroundFactory

    • CEMETERY_CHAR

      public static final char CEMETERY_CHAR
      char 'c' represents Cemetery
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

    • successRate

      private int successRate
      As required: Each cemetery has a 25% success rate to spawn/create Undead (Hollow soldier)(@see Enemies) at every turn

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Cemetery

      public Cemetery()
      Constructor without any parameter It is for FancyGroundFactory

  • 方法详细资料

    • createUndead

      private void createUndead​(Location location)
      Creating Undead at the location of each cemetery with a success rate
      参数:
      location - the location of this Cemetery object. (each ground(character in the map) has its own location)

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location location)
      ground will execute the function at each turn/round
      覆盖:
      tick 在类中 Ground
      参数:
      location - The location of the Ground

    • canActorEnter

      public boolean canActorEnter​(Actor actor)
      从类复制的说明: Ground
      Override this to implement impassable terrain, or terrain that is only passable if conditions are met.
      覆盖:
      canActorEnter 在类中 Ground
      参数:
      actor - the Actor to check
      返回:
      true

    • setSuccessRate

      private boolean setSuccessRate​(int successRate)
      setter -- set successRate attribute
      参数:
      successRate - success rate to spawn/create Undead at each turn
      返回:
      boolean value - if setting is successful
